preprocessors.description:
preprocessors
Preprocess this object in-memory when it's loaded, run scripts using the variable 'Iris.getPreprocessorObject()' and modify properties about this object before it's used.
   
List<Script>

    
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
Must be a valid Script (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

variables.description:
variables
Variables to use in this expression
   
List of ExpressionLoads (Objects)

    
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.

expression.description:
expression
The expression. Inherited variables are x, y and z. Avoid using those variable names.
   
Text

anyOf.description: Represents a variable to use in your expression. Do not set the name to x, y, or z, also don't duplicate names.

name.description:
name
The variable to assign this value to. Do not set the name to x, y, or z
   
Text

    
* Default Value is

staticValue.description:
staticValue
If the style value is not defined, this value will be used
   
Number

    
* Default Value is -1.0

anyOf.description:
styleValue
If defined, this variable will use a generator style as it's value
   
GeneratorStyle (Object)
A gen style
    
You can instead specify "snippet/style/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.

styleValue.description:
styleValue
If defined, this variable will use a generator style as it's value
   
GeneratorStyle (Object)
A gen style
    
You can instead specify "snippet/style/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.

engineStreamValue.description:
engineStreamValue
If defined, iris will use an internal stream from the engine as it's value
   
EngineStreamType
Represents a stream from the engine
Must be a valid EngineStreamType (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

engineValue.description:
engineValue
If defined, iris will use an internal value from the engine as it's value
   
EngineValueType
Represents a value from the engine
Must be a valid EngineValueType (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

obj-com-volmit-iris-engine-object-irisex.description: Represents a variable to use in your expression. Do not set the name to x, y, or z, also don't duplicate names.

oneOf.description: Represents the given slope at the x, z coordinates
Represents the real terrain height ignoring fluid, this includes carving, caves & noise features into this stream.
Represents the real terrain height including fluid, this includes carving, caves & noise features into this stream.
Represents the base generator height at the given position. This includes only the biome generators / interpolation and noise features but does not include carving, caves.

Represents the base generator height at the given position. This includes only the biome generators / interpolation and noise features but does not include carving, caves. with Max(height, fluidHeight).
Represents the overlay noise generators summed (dimension setting)
Represents the overlay noise generators summed (dimension setting)
Represents the object chance clip. If a noise feature alters the object chance in this area this number will drop below 1. (100%)
Represents the noise style of regions
Represents the identity of regions. Each region has a unique number (very large numbers)

style.description:
style
The chance is 1 in CHANCE per interval
   
NoiseStyle
Styles of noise
    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
Must be a valid NoiseStyle (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

zoom.description:
zoom
The zoom of this style
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 1.0
* Minimum allowed is 1.0E-5

expression.description:
expression
Instead of using the style property, use a custom expression to represent this style.
   
Iris Expression

Must be a valid expressions (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

multiplier.description:
multiplier
The Output multiplier. Only used if parent is fracture.
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 1.0
* Minimum allowed is 1.0E-5

axialFracturing.description:
axialFracturing
If set to true, each dimension will be fractured with a different order of input coordinates. This is usually 2 or 3 times slower than normal.
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

anyOf.description:
fracture
Apply a generator to the coordinate field fed into this parent generator. I.e. Distort your generator with another generator.
   
GeneratorStyle (Object)
A gen style
    
You can instead specify "snippet/style/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.

fracture.description:
fracture
Apply a generator to the coordinate field fed into this parent generator. I.e. Distort your generator with another generator.
   
GeneratorStyle (Object)
A gen style
    
You can instead specify "snippet/style/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.

exponent.description:
exponent
The exponent
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 1.0
* Minimum allowed is 0.01562
* Maximum allowed is 64.0

oneOf.description: Represents actual height of the engine
Represents virtual bottom of the engine in the compound. If this engine is on top of another engine, it's min height would be at the maxHeight of the previous engine + 1
Represents virtual top of the engine in the compound. If this engine is below another engine, it's max height would be at the minHeight of the next engine - 1
The fluid height defined in the dimension file
